attributes.action: Eviction should be banned for at least 6 to 8 months for renters in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Because income has gone down and even if situation improves to generate enough income to resolve the rent areas may take time.
attributes.background: The government and its parliament should introduce stricter legislation that landlords or housing agents can not evict renters in next 6 month at least.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304682

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
